definitions.definition: A rapid alternation between an indicated note and the one above it as an ornament ; in musical notation usually indicated with the letters tr written above the staff .
A type of consonantal sound that is produced by vibrations of the tongue against the place of articulation: for example, Spanish ⟨rr⟩, /r/ .
A tremulous high-pitched vocal sound produced by cats.

main_definition: ( music ) A rapid alternation between an indicated note and the one above it as an ornament ; in musical notation usually indicated with the letters tr written above the staff .
secondary_definitions: ( phonetics ) A type of consonantal sound that is produced by vibrations of the tongue against the place of articulation: for example, Spanish ⟨rr⟩, /r/ .
A tremulous high-pitched vocal sound produced by cats.
